system.description: A short-bladed sword, typically 18-24 inches in length, designed for close-quarters combat. The compact size allows for quick draws and strikes in confined spaces. This category includes gladius, xiphos, wakizashi (when not wielded as a paired weapon with katana), and similar short military swords. Often used as a sidearm or backup weapon, the shortsword's versatility makes it invaluable.
